body_html: Yes but not without WITH_CUDA (sorry I was unclear in the description). @ebetica mentioned it was annoying to have to define this in their build when using this file, when they already define WITH_CUDA when compiling pytorch. By moving it into the cpp file it gets baked into the library and they don't have to define it. @colesbury will this be a major performance hit? @ebetica we might have to keep it then

body: Yes but not without `WITH_CUDA` (sorry I was unclear in the description). @ebetica mentioned it was annoying to have to define this in their build when using this file, when they already define `WITH_CUDA` when compiling pytorch. By moving it into the cpp file it gets baked into the library and they don't have to define it. @colesbury will this be a major performance hit? @ebetica we might have to keep it then
